product_name: Carve Designs Canyon Sunshirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Long enough to wear as a tunic, the women's long-sleeve Canyon Sunshirt from Carve Designs offers superb UPF 50+ sun protection and great stretch for your outdoor adventures. Polyester/spandex fabric features a durable water repellent finish so when you get splashed, the water beads up and rolls off. Adjustable drawcord at waist lets you choose your look. Shirt features a full snap front, 2 chest pockets and 1 zippered arm pocket. Mesh venting at back yoke enhances airflow. Adjustable sleeves have a button-tab for rolling up. The women's Canyon Sunshirt from Carve Designs features a relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: Long enough to wear as a tunic, the women's long-sleeve Canyon Sunshirt from Carve Designs offers superb UPF 50+ sun protection and great stretch for your outdoor adventures.
